My name is Jamie Bennett and I'm from Bath in the UK <nowiki>[[http://maps.google.com/maps?f=q&hl=en&geocode=&q=bath,+uk&ie=UTF8&t=h&z=13]]</nowiki>. I've been using Linux since installing Slackware in 1995 and I am now an Ubuntu Fan/Promoter/Contributor since the first release. I try to contribute as much I can with the development of open source software, bug hunting, bug reporting, and patches. 

I am also an Ubuntu Mobile Developer for Canonical.
